oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Betriebliche Bewirtschaftungsindikatoren für Biodiversität im Ökologischen Landbau und in extensiven Anbausystemen in Europa
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Friedel, Jürgen K.
Arndorfer, Michaela
Balázs, Katalin
Dennis, Peter
Eiter, Sebastian
Jeanneret, Philippe
Jongman, Rob
Kainz, Max
Lüscher, Gisela
Moreno, Gerardo
Paoletti, Maurizio G.
Pointereau, Philippe
Sarthou, Jean-Pierre
Stoyanova, Siyka
Herzog, Felix
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop combinations and interactions
Soil biology
Composting and manuring
Soil tillage
Biodiversity and ecosystem services
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Farming practices are the key to maintaining and restoring farmland biodiversity. Selected farm management indicators, regarded as scientifically sound, practicable and attractive to stakeholders, were tested against species indicators in various farm types in 12 case studies across Europe. A set of eight farm management indicators is recommended, reflecting the pressure on biodiversity by farm management via energy and nutrient input, mechanical operations, pesticide use and livestock.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Friedel, Jürgen K.; Arndorfer, Michaela; Balázs, Katalin; Dennis, Peter; Eiter, Sebastian; Jeanneret, Philippe; Jongman, Rob; Kainz, Max; Lüscher, Gisela; Moreno, Gerardo; Paoletti, Maurizio G.; Pointereau, Philippe; Sarthou, Jean-Pierre; Stoyanova, Siyka and Herzog, Felix (2013) Betriebliche Bewirtschaftungsindikatoren für Biodiversität im Ökologischen Landbau und in extensiven Anbausystemen in Europa. Paper at: 12. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, Rheinische Friedrich-Wilhelms-Universität, Bonn, 5. bis 8. März 2013.
